# Lorem Ipsum Amet
## Blind text generator

### Installation

With gemfile `gem 'lorem_ipsum_amet'`

Without gemfile `gem install 'lorem_ipsum_amet'`


### Usage

`LoremIpsum.lorem_ipsum` - default Lorem Ipsum text

`LoremIpsum.lorem_ipsum(50)` - 50 characters

`LoremIpsum.lorem_ipsum(paragraphs: 4)` - 4 paragraphs

`LoremIpsum.lorem_ipsum(words: 100)` - 100 words

`LoremIpsum.short` - a short text

`LoremIpsum.long` - a long text

... And many more options (check the README)

### Rails

Just use "lorem_ipsum" in your views as in the examples above!

ERB:
`<%= text_area_tag 'placeholder', lorem_ipsum %>`

HAML:
`%p= lorem_ipsum(paragraphs: 5)`
name: Lorem Ipsum Amet
tagline: Blind text generator with tons of configuration options
